articles.title: How AI Can Help Create and Optimize Drugs To Treat Opioid Addiction - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers are turning to artificial intelligence to create and optimize potential new drugs to help people with opioid addiction. It is estimated that about three million Americans suffer from opioid use disorder, and every year more than 80,000 Americans d…
